album.name: Moving House
album.description: Thursday 23 August 2001: we moved house from Ealing (London) to Brighton (UK south coast).

image.caption: Office, pre-move
image.description: Tuesday: the office in a state before we started dismantling for proper

image.caption: Office, mid-move
image.description: Wednesday AM: Richard starts packing stuff.

image.caption: Filming the flat
image.description: Wednesday AM: filming the flat for insurance purposes.

image.caption: Packers at work
image.description: We paid people to come and pack for us. We recommend this.

image.caption: Bedroom, mid-pack
image.description: Richard sorting through his smalls.

image.caption: Casualty
image.description: A terrible loss: a dog crushed under boxes (clue for the clueless: it's not a real dog).

image.caption: Packers packing
image.description: The lounge in mid-pack. Yes, we just stood around and watched, taking the occasional photo.

image.caption: Flat sold
image.description: In a house of seven flats, there were three boards outside. The "SOLD" one is ours.

image.caption: Boxes
image.description: A box with another box and look! there's another box... etc.

image.caption: Living room
image.description: Living room...with boxes

image.caption: Lunch time
image.description: While men emptied our flat, we ate tapas and drank beer.

image.caption: Empty office
image.description: It's all gone.

image.caption: Empty bedroom
image.description: It's all gone.

image.caption: Light effect
image.description: The fan is one of those that rotates. As the sun hit the fan it created a cool light effect on the wall. I guess you had to be there.

image.caption: Not much left
image.description: We were left with a sofa bed (and some bloke who was a bit tired after eating too much tapas).

image.caption: Empty living room
image.description: After packing on Wednesday, the van returned Thursday morning to take what was left.

image.caption: Garden
image.description: This is the covered half of our new house.

image.caption: Kitchen
image.description: It's a kitchen.

image.caption: Dining room
image.description: The dining room bit, that leads into the garden.

image.caption: Stairs
image.description: Green. Very green.

image.caption: Garden
image.description: The other half of the garden, taken from the balcony.

image.caption: Bedroom
image.description: It's a bedroom.

image.caption: Van arrives
image.description: Van with stuff in it.

image.caption: Dining room
image.description: Dining room with stuff starting to arrive.

image.caption: Living room
image.description: Living room with stuff.

image.caption: Kitchen
image.description: Kitchen, being filled up with stuff.

image.caption: Van leaves
image.description: An empty van departs

image.caption: First guests
image.description: Paul, Tess and James drop round with a bottle of bubbly. This happens all the time in Brighton.
